actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the increases in the wine tax enacted as part of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the increases in the wine tax enacted as part of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990. Repeals the credit allowed to small domestic producers of wine.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the increases in the wine tax enacted as part of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990.
